1.0.1.name: wordpress/thecartpress-dynamic-options
1.0.1.description:
TheCartPress Dynamic Options is a plugin for TheCartPress eCommerce plugin. It allows to add n-levels options (or variations) to the products, such as sizes, colors...

TheCartPress Dynamic Options

  • Allows to manage Attributes and Attributes sets
  • Supports Multi Lingual

Unlimited features

  • TheCartPress-dynamicoptions is compatible with TheCartPress and has been developed by TheCartPress Team.

More info and Community

  • TheCartPress Extend: plugins, themes and custom development
  • TheCartPress Demo
  • TheCartPress Community/Support
  • TheCartPress Site
